articles.description: This exclusive clip from the Netflix murder mystery The Pale Blue Eye depicts the first meeting between Christian Bale's investigator Augustus Landor and a strange young cadet named Edgar Allan Poe, played by Harry Melling.
articles.content: Netflixs suspense film The Pale Blue Eye follows Christian Bales detective Augustus Landor as he investigates strange murders at West Point military academy in 1830. In this exclusive scene from the … [+1924 chars]
